meanings.definition: A hard, sharp blow or hit.
meanings.sent1: The boxer delivered a powerful pasting to his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The pasting from the falling branch left a mark on the car's roof.
meanings.sent3: After the pasting from the soccer ball, he learned to duck next time.
meanings.sent4: The pasting of the storm on the old house was relentless and unforgiving.
meanings.sent5: The pasting of the hammer on the nail echoed through the workshop.

meanings.definition: The act of covering a surface with glue or adhesive material.
meanings.sent1: She did a neat pasting of the paper onto the cardboard.
meanings.sent2: The pasting of the stickers on the notebook was done carefully.
meanings.sent3: The pasting of the labels on the jars made them look professional.
meanings.sent4: The pasting of the wallpaper on the wall transformed the room completely.
meanings.sent5: The pasting of the stamps on the envelope was precise and tidy.

meanings.sent1: The team suffered a humiliating pasting in the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The pasting they received in the debate left them speechless.
meanings.sent3: The pasting in the card game was so bad, they had to reshuffle the deck.
meanings.sent4: The pasting in the video game made him rethink his strategy.
meanings.sent5: The pasting in the spelling bee taught her the importance of practice.
